text: Pol nop anɨgɨl dam lel, ñɨn anep tɨgawup ak yek. Mɨnek mamɨd ak, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl yɨbɨl Ananayas, ne taun Sisaliya amnɨg, Juda bɨawl ogɨnap poŋɨd, bɨ takaw adɨk madɨk gɨl agñeb kɨli Tetulus ayɨp, Sisaliya ayaŋ amnɨlak. Amɨl, gapman bɨawl Peliks nop nɨŋɨd anɨb agɨlak, Pol nop kot gun agɨlak.
